description:
When you need an exceptional criminal defense or personal injury attorney, come to Advocates Law Firm, LLC, formly in New Britain, now in Famington, Connecticut. These are the only two areas of law we practice, and we have been successfully doing so for nearly 40 years. Our law firm proudly represents clients throughout Connecticut and Massachusetts.

As a full-service personal injury and criminal defense law firm, we provide high-quality legal advice, counsel and representation in the following areas:

  • Motor vehicle accidents: Auto, bus, truck, etc.
  • Personal injury: Slips and falls, dog bites, defective products, etc.
  • Medical malpractice
  • Legal malpractice
  • Criminal defense: State and federal charges, misdemeanors and felonies
  • Grievance defense

We also compassionately represent grieving families who have lost a loved one to wrongful death due to someone's negligence of wrongdoing.

Ron Murphy, our law firm's owner and principal trial lawyer earned his Juris Doctor at the University of Connecticut School of Law. He also graduated from the National Criminal Defense College, the Trial Lawyers College, and earned his Board Certification as a Civil Trial Advocate from the National Board of Trial Advocacy.

Advocates Law Firm, LLC, offers free initial consultations and virtual appointments for our clients' peace of mind. We also accept all major credit cards for our clients' maximum convenience.
